sentences.en: A blurred facsimile of the ball slices or hooks down the fairway.
sentences.cn: 模拟的高尔夫球显得模糊不清,或左或右地飞落在球座与草坪间的剪平草地上.

sentences.en: Dogleg right , water appears on right. The fairway is not so forgiving.
sentences.cn: 右狗腿, 右边一路有水,球道较窄.

sentences.en: Dogleg right. fairway but small green and well guarded by bunkers.
sentences.cn: 右狗腿,球道阔但系个果岭细,仲有沙池守住.

sentences.en: Fairway - The long , narrow, short landscape where you should hit your ball to.
sentences.cn: 球道:即将球推进狭长的短草皮.

sentences.en: Fairway 13:540 yd, par 5, having 90 o right doglegs and 3 - 4 routes.
sentences.cn: 球道:540码, 标准杆5杆, 近90度的右狗腿球道,有3至4条击球线路.

sentences.en: Fairway 7:549 yd , par 5, a down swing makes a rush down a thousand li.
sentences.cn: 球道:549码, 标准杆5杆, 挥杆而下,一泻千里.

sentences.en: Fairway's words were the result of independent reflection.
sentences.cn: 费伟这番话完全是他个人捉摸出来的.

sentences.en: I met with a small fishing boat at the entrance of fairway.
sentences.cn: 我轮驶近航道入口时遇到一小鱼船.

sentences.en: Index 13, there is a bunker in the middle of the fairway.
sentences.cn: 难度13, 大堂正中有个大沙池等着你.

sentences.en: Laura Davies is walking on fairway.
sentences.cn: 劳拉·戴维斯走在球道上.

sentences.en: Lights of ships moved in the fairway - a great stir of Lights going up and going down.
sentences.cn: 船火在航道上漂动 -- 只只亮光点点,纷纭繁乱,上下穿行.

sentences.en: Mike drove the ball down the fairway.
sentences.cn: 麦克一下把球击到了球到上.

sentences.en: Sell golf club, golf ball, golf bag, Golf club, driver, fairway wood.
sentences.cn: 出售高尔夫俱乐部, 高尔夫球, 高尔夫球袋, 高尔夫球俱乐部, 司机, 木杆.

sentences.en: You can take pilot a No.5 Fairway Buoy.
sentences.cn: 你船可在5号航道浮筒上引航员.

sentences.en: You must anchor clear of fairway.
sentences.cn: 你船必须离开航道抛锚.

words.tran_cn: 航路；水上飞机升降用的水面跑道；（高尔夫球场上的）平坦球道

trans.tran_cn: 航路，水上跑道，（高尔夫球场上的）平坦球道
trans.tran_en: the part of a  golf course  that you hit the ball along towards the hole
